send_to_cs: Shipping inquiries on a current order
For product or general inquiries you can't find the answer to, use PGI shortcut
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Don't use the word "unfortunately" to discuss our appointment structure
Don't use the word "best" to reference a product (e.g., best ring, etc.)
templates: If cx are looking for an engagement ring and don't provide specifics, use LER shortcut
dos_and_donts: If the customer responds incorrectly to the journey, don't send jny temp, recommend items based on their selection instead
Cx can create their own engagement ring on the webiste by choosing a setting, stone and size
Cx can customize rings by working with designers who will use their ideas, drawings, images to create the ring they want
Don't disclose the locations of their labs/production facilities

246.SystemMessage1: Brilliant Earth: Welcome to Brilliant Earth! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
246.SystemMessage2: Brilliant Earth: Hi! I'm Ava, your personal jewelry concierge. Do you have any questions I can help answer? brilliantearth.attn.tv/a9D0Yzau-2_h .
246.customerMessage1:
Hi
I have a lot of questions but am on the road right now ....I'm thinking of getting some diamond studs preferably lab grown. Can you shoot me the info on how they rate the lab grown diamonds
246.AgentMessage1:
Brilliant Earth: Thank you for reaching out! Sorry, it seems there was an issue, and the image you sent didn't load properly on our end, but thanks for the details! 

Our lab diamonds are certified by independent diamond grading labs, and have an inscription that matches the number on the laboratory certificate. Lab grown diamonds have the same physical, chemical, and optical characteristics as natural diamonds, as well as the same fire, scintillation, and sparkle. They are real diamonds. 

Do you have any specific style, or material in mind? In the meantime, you can find some great diamond stud options here: https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/avx30l-0T-7p/
246.customerMessage2: Most lab grown diamonds are much less than a diamond in cost ..however I am looking for white gold 1/2 to 3/4 caret each
246.AgentMessage2: Brilliant Earth: Thanks for the info! What do you think about these Perfect Martini Lab Diamond Stud Earrings (1/2 ct. tw.) in 18K White Gold? https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/awK-3ltWqSZl/?=. This 3-prong martini setting keeps the metal minimal so more light can shine through the colorless lab diamond.
246.customerMessage3: The real diamonds are finite & mined which makes them more valuable
246.AgentMessage3: Brilliant Earth: I totally understand your concern. You may consider the Perfect 4-Prong Lab Diamond Stud Earrings (1/2 ct. tw.) in 18K White Gold here instead: https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/anbJfjFpVb4y It's available in 1/2 and 3/4 carat.

247.customerMessage1: My bank statement tells me i purchased two chains on dec.25 and i only recieved one which barely fits on my ankle...once again lmk what i can do with out pure dissappointment :~(
247.AgentMessage1: GLD: Thanks for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear that, it's not the experience we wanted you to have with us. Could you please let me know your email address and order number? I'd like to check on this with my team for you.
247.AgentMessage2:
GLD: Thanks! Based on the screenshot you sent, I don't see any charges from December 25 or any transactions from us. I also checked, and I can only see one order here: #4641536, placed on 12/31 for the Micro Tennis Necklace in White Gold, 14k White Gold Plated / 16" / White Gold.

Could you please check your email, including your spam and promotions folders, as order confirmations can sometimes be directed there? If you're still unable to locate it, please confirm your email address, the full name on the order, and your complete shipping address. Once I have that information, I'll forward it to my team so we can check further in our records.
247.customerMessage3: Two charges for $48.96 &  $35.00 from yer company and i recieved exactly one half of a chain that is beautiful but only fits on my wife's ankle. So i got 50% off & about half the product :~(
247.customerMessage4: Those charges where on dec 25 & dec 31
247.AgentMessage3:
GLD: I'm sorry for the confusion. I don't see any orders or charges on our end for $48.96 or $35.00. The only order we have is #4641536 for $56.95, which matches the Micro Tennis Necklace you received.

I recommend checking with your bank regarding those charges, as we don't have any orders or payments matching $48.96 or $35.00 on our end.

dos_and_donts: Always check the product page when they ask about processing times
Don't send the Canadian return link/policy
